TextView.android:text: 4 Muscle Ups
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
3 Muscle Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
2 Muscle Ups ---> 10 Muscle Ups (p)
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 Muscle Up ---> 5 Muscle Ups (b)
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
12 Pull Ups + 12.12.12. Isometric Hold ---> 20 Straight Bar Dips
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
6x 95kg Squats
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
8-10x 70kg Front Squats ---> 10x 40kg Bulgarian Split Squats (E/S)
x3-4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
60 seconds Wall Sit with 20kg ---> 60 seconds Wall Sit
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 30kg Back Extensions ---> 10 Back Extensions
x3-4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
8x 20kg Pull Ups ---> 10x 20kg Dips ---> 1-2 Muscle Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5x 20kg Pull Ups ---> 8x 20kg Dips ---> 1 Muscle Up
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 High Pull Ups ---> 10 Clapping Push Ups
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
4 Dragon Flags (Slow Eccentric on last rep)
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 seconds L-Sit Hold
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 seconds L-Sit Hold ---> 5 Toes to Bar
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 Bar Leg Raises ---> 10 Bar Knee Raises
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 Windshield Wipers ---> 20x 10kg Back Extensions
x4 Sets (2 min rest inbetween sets)
10 Muscle Ups (r)
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
8 Ring Dips ---> 12 Russian Dips
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Ring Pull Ups ---> 10 Chin Ups
x4-5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 70kg Squats ---> 15x 40kg Lunges (E/S) ---> 1 min 20kg Wall Sit
x4-5 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
3 Dragon Flags
x7 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Intermediate Program Level 3 - Week 1
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
Although not required, it is reccommended to repeat this week's workout at least once.
